item.title: Empowering TB patients and providers: poster video at TBScience2018
item.description: We are presenting at TBScience2018 conference, part of the 49th Union World Conference on Lung Health. Title: Empowering Patients & Providers, Prediction Tools to Improve TB Contact Investigation & Preventive Treatment. I’ve recorded a screencast explaning the poster (7 minutes). Please see below for the poster and for full transcripts. Here’s our poster, poster #3384: High resolution pdf version Transcripts Hello everyone! This is Ruoran Li. Here’s a seven minutes overview of the poster we’re presenting at the TBScience 2018 conference.

item.title: Implementation + data science: 4th Kolokotrones Symposium
item.description: Several key concepts and learnings: LAGO evaluation design Learn-as-you-go design presented by Daniel Nevo (paper not published yet): contrast with other types of trial designs. The Kirkpatrick Model of learning evaluation: Reaction - what participants thought and felt about the training (satisfaction; “smile sheets”) Learning - the resulting increase in knowledge and/or skills, and change in attitudes. This evaluation occurs during the training in the form of either a knowledge demonstration or test.
